class-descriptor.name: assignRoleToUnit
class-descriptor.deprecated-message: use classdescriptor orgrolemap instead (do not use meaningfull PBS levelnames in classdescriptor names, this mapping does not make sense when used for plants with this name)

class-descriptor.name: createSystemUser
class-descriptor.deprecated-message: use classdescriptor systemuser instead (since these mappings are alos used for updating having create in the name does not make sense)

class-descriptor.name: createUser
class-descriptor.deprecated-message: use classdescriptor simpleuser instead (since these mappings are also used for updating having create in the name does not make sense)
